answers.answer: Do you have any health issues?  Being overtired, stressed, having too much alcohol, diabetes, other illnesses, as well as psychological problems, worrying about any unwanted pregnancies - as well as worrying about not being able to perform can cause erectile dysfunction.Use a latex free condom if you are concerned about any unwanted pregnancies.Make a appointment to see your doctor to rule out any underlying illness or prostate problems.  If all is well, then you need to look into any psychological issues that you may have to help resolve the problem.

question: I have a panic attack feeling on penis when doing sex and can't finish and penisbecomes small. Is it psychogenic or is it physical? What should i do?
title: Sex problem
